alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Kosciusko; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 3:18PM EST until February 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Fulton IN, Kosciusko, Pulaski, Starke and Marshall Counties. For the Tippecanoe River...including Ora, Winamac, Norway Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tippecanoe River near Ora. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Flooding begins to affect residences near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday morning and continue falling to 11.1 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 930 AM EST /830 AM CST/.
